metadata.feature_description: Track and display article view counts

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki module and view article list
steps.expected: Wiki list page loads with articles
steps.actual: Wiki list page loaded showing articles including 'User Mention Test - Jan 16 2026'

steps.action: Click on article 'User Mention Test - Jan 16 2026' to view details
steps.expected: Article detail page shows view count
steps.actual: Article detail page displayed with '2 Views' shown in the info panel area

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki list page and use Sort dropdown to select 'Sort by views'
steps.expected: Articles should be reordered by view count
steps.actual: Sort dropdown activated, URL changed to include 'sort=views' parameter, and article list was reordered by view count

observations: View count is displayed in the article detail page info panel using ArticleInfo.ViewCount property (Article.ascx lines 71-72)
View count correctly pluralizes: '1 View' vs 'N Views'
Backend uses IncreaseViewCount method in ArticleController.cs (lines 186-189) to increment view count via data provider
Sort by views functionality available in the Wiki list page dropdown menu
